title: Истории про Фину
overview: An example of the best Russian animation of a new wave. The project "Antimult" became known first in the Russian Internet (www.antimult.ru), and then in the world. Anti-cartoons were shown by the Russian NTV channel and some European television channels. In the episodes of cartoons, people appear who look like BG, Putin, Ernst, Clinton, Lagutenko, Zhirinovsky, Schwarzenegger, Kramarov, Kuleshov, Pavlovsky and cars similar to Citroen SZ and Bentley Continental GT.The plot of these 18 cartoons: The owner of the Moscow advertising agency, the beautiful businesswoman Fina, and her employees: designer Pasha, professor Lev Davydovich and cleaning lady Klavdia Nikitichna find themselves in funny, sad, instructive situations.
